title: “driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Driving Instructor
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Driving Instructor 

Licensing) (Extension of Period of Validity of Licence) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic (driving instructor licensing) (extension period validity licence) regulation 2021

title: “driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“ADI card” shall be construed in accordance with Regulation 15(3)(b) of the 
Regulations of 2009 insofar as it relates to a driving instructor’s licence but 
does not relate to a trainee driving instructor’s licence; 

“driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations 
of 2009; 

“Regulations of 2009” means the Road Traffic (Driving Instructor Licensing) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 203 of 2009); 

“trainee driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the 
Regulations of 2009.

title: “driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations
heading: 3. Notwithstanding Regulations 27(1) and 28(3) of the Regulations of
text_raw:
3. Notwithstanding Regulations 27(1) and 28(3) of the Regulations of 
2009, a driving instructor’s licence (other than a trainee driving instructor’s 
licence) granted during the period beginning on 1 September 2018 and ending 
on 3 January 2021 shall expire at the end of the period of 3 years from the date 
of grant of the licence.
text_norm: 3 notwithstanding regulation 27(1) 28(3) regulation 2009 driving instructor licence (other trainee driving instructor licence) granted period beginning 1 september 2018 ending 3 january 2021 shall expire end period 3 year date grant licence

title: “driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations
heading: 4. A holder of a driving instructor’s licence (other than a trainee driving
text_raw:
4. A holder of a driving instructor’s licence (other than a trainee driving 
instructor’s licence) referred to in Regulation 3 shall, notwithstanding the 
period referred to in Regulation 32(1) of the Regulations of 2009, pass a check 
test as provided for in that Regulation 32 within the period of 3 years from the 
date of grant of the licence. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [215] 3

title: “driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations
heading: 5. Notwithstanding Schedules 5 and 6 of the Regulations of 2009, the date
text_raw:
5. Notwithstanding Schedules 5 and 6 of the Regulations of 2009, the date 
of expiry of a driving instructor’s licence (other than a trainee driving 
instructor’s licence) referred to in Regulation 3 and of an ADI card issued to 
the holder of such a licence shall be 1 year from the date of expiry specified on 
the licence and on the ADI card to be the date of its expiry. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 May, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [215]

title: “driving instructor’s licence” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Driver Instructor Licensing) (No. 
2) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 203 of 2009) to provide that a driving 
instructor’s licence issued during the period beginning on 1 September 2018 
and ending on 03 January 2021 is extended by 1 year. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [215] 5
